name: You're tearing me apart (Devmack, el_moue, Milkopis)
name_original: You're tearing me apart (Devmack, el_moue, Milkopis)
description:
Control your character and make him twist in unimaginable pain! Sacrifaces must be made! No pain can stop you from escape.

Sometimes you will be forced to use your head. In a way you couldn't guess...

Quick tip: Enter tutorial to learn how to play :)

Authors: 

  1. Tomasz Lukaszyk:  https://github.com/tomaszlukaszyk
  2. Patryk Mandrak:  https://github.com/PatrykMandrak 
  3. Dominik Starzyk: https://github.com/Devmack
